title: didnt get my rp
body:
Just bought 350 rp, get "succes", return to a store, but rp didnt changed.
Money went out from card

replies.body: Hey, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  Our billing team can work with you directly and help out privately than here on the boards.  We'll see you there!
